Smart Towel: A towel that can monitor your body temperature and adjust the temperature of your shower accordingly.
Self-Drying Towel: A towel that can dry itself using a built-in mechanism, eliminating the need for manual drying.
Towel with Built-In Hairdryer: A towel that can also serve as a hairdryer, reducing the number of devices needed in the bathroom.
Towel with Built-In Light: A towel that can also serve as a night light, making it easier to see in the dark.
Towel with Built-In Music: A towel that can also serve as a portable speaker, allowing you to listen to music while you shower.
